Auckland’s Southern Motorway: SH1 reopens after emergency services respond to multi-vehicle crash in Bombay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aucklands-southern-motorway-emergency-services-respond-to-multi-vehicle-crash-in-bombay/5VB32KZZLBBIFPRN2N47DY37PE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aucklands-southern-motorway-emergency-services-respond-to-multi-vehicle-crash-in-bombay/5VB32KZZLBBIFPRN2N47DY37PE/ Police said there were no serious injuries reported after the accident. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 07:38:48 +0000 At 8pm, traffic had backed-up almost 3km from the Bombay off-ramp. Photo / Google Maps
Auckland business owners devastated by 96-day rail network shutdown https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-business-owners-devastated-by-96-day-rail-network-shutdown/LWCAIO42BJAC3BJPZ7AKYWVL3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-business-owners-devastated-by-96-day-rail-network-shutdown/LWCAIO42BJAC3BJPZ7AKYWVL3Q/ The first major closure will go from December 27, 2024, until January 28, 2025. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 07:19:34 +0000 Auckland's train network will have to close for 96 days as part of a final push to get the long-awaited City Rail Link finished and ready for 2026.
Former Manurewa West principal got school funds for massages, clothes for ministry permission https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-manurewa-west-principal-got-school-funds-for-massages-clothes-for-ministry-permission/C46BVO2ZLNCZXE5KTBHETCDVFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-manurewa-west-principal-got-school-funds-for-massages-clothes-for-ministry-permission/C46BVO2ZLNCZXE5KTBHETCDVFE/ David Wallis' behaviour amounted to 'serious misconduct', tribunal rules. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:48:00 +0000 David Wallis' behaviour amounted to 'serious misconduct', a tribunal has ruled.
Pygmy sperm whale stranded near Gisborne humanely euthanised https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/pygmy-sperm-whale-stranded-near-gisborne- humanely-euthanished/B6V6IGO5T5ENRNPVPTBOFJ7DDI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/pygmy-sperm-whale-stranded-near-gisborne- humanely-euthanished/B6V6IGO5T5ENRNPVPTBOFJ7DDI/ DoC, iwi and members of the public attempted to help the animal on Waikanae Beach. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:47:35 +0000 Members of the public and a digger operator attempted to refloat a stranded pygmy sperm whale on Waikanae Beach in Gisborne, but it kept returning to shore. Photo / Wynsley Wrigley
The level 2 NCEA maths question that knocked the confidence of our top students https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-level-2-ncea-maths-question-that-knocked-the-confidence-of-our-top-students/QDISMTPN4BDD3OUELHUZ25EFOI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-level-2-ncea-maths-question-that-knocked-the-confidence-of-our-top-students/QDISMTPN4BDD3OUELHUZ25EFOI/ Kirsty WynnThe question on the volume of a drink container was above the level of the standard tested Fri, 08 Nov 2024 06:47:00 +0000 The question was well above the skill level for even excellence students in level 2 maths according to head teachers.
Vandalism and graffiti hit popular South Auckland playgrounds https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vandalism-and-graffiti-hit-popular-south-auckland-playgrounds/MNR7QLURXNB7FJOAPPCRZMWVVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vandalism-and-graffiti-hit-popular-south-auckland-playgrounds/MNR7QLURXNB7FJOAPPCRZMWVVQ/ Mary Afemata, Local Democracy ReporterVandals have struck repeatedly at more than a dozen community play areas in recent months. Photo / Mary Afemata, LDR
